titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Science and Technology in the One Hundred Eleventh Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Provides amounts for expenses of the House Committee on Science and Technology for the 111th Congress.
